name: iscmgmALT
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ccmgm2), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2)))
-| wceq(ccmgm2, crab(hs0, cmgm2, wbr(cfv(cplusg, cv(hs0)), ccomlaw, cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, cmgm2)
-| diffsw(hs0, wbr(c1, ccomlaw, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CMgmALT ↔(c0 ∈ MgmALT ∧ c1[comLaw]c2))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0)↔ c1[comLaw]c2))
⊣ CMgmALT = { hs0 ∈ MgmALT |(+ ` hs0)[comLaw](Base ` hs0)}
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, MgmALT)
⊣ d(hs0, c1[comLaw]c2)
